story.synopsys: In the year 387, in the heart of a thriving ancient city, darkness enveloped a grandeur residence perched atop a hill, casting an eerie shadow over the town below. Intrigue whispered through the narrow cobblestone streets as word spread of a heinous crime committed within the household. A prominent aristocrat, known for his opulent parties and secret dealings, was found dead in his study, a grotesque wound marring his lifeless body. Whispers of betrayal, revenge, and unbridled ambition filled the silent air, as everyone who had crossed paths with the deceased aristocrat became a potential suspect. With the ruling elites skulking behind their lavish masks, and the tension thickening with each passing moment, a seasoned detective arrived, ready to untangle the web of deceit and expose the truth hidden among the secrets of this ancient city.

Emilia is known to be highly intelligent and resourceful, always plotting and scheming to maintain her status and influence. Her connections reach far and wide, ensuring that she always has eyes and ears in every corner of the city. Emilia's bias lies in reaping the rewards of power and luxury, often using her connections to acquire rare and valuable items. There are rumors that Emilia had a deep-seated grudge against the victim, but whether there is any truth to this remains to be discovered.
